content.raw: Yeah that sounds great! I'm happy to do that, it's something BLACS should have anyway. I might make that a separate pull request, this one can be merged once it's done. I'll also strip out adding a widget for this plugin to the main UI file - the plugin itself can be responsible for inserting itself into a sensible place in the GUI without having a space explicitly set aside for it.
content.html: Yeah that sounds great! I'm happy to do that, it's something BLACS should have anyway. I might make that a separate pull request, this one can be merged once it's done. I'll also strip out adding a widget for this plugin to the main UI file - the plugin itself can be responsible for inserting itself into a sensible place in the GUI without having a space explicitly set aside for it.
